block.title: Crittercism API Info
block.text: - To generate your Crittercism OAuth Access Token, please visit https://app.crittercism.com/developers/user-settings then click on the OAuth Tokens tab and follow the instructions on the page.
- To change the Credentials or Crittercism API Key later, first remove the entry from SPLUNK_HOME/etc/apps/crittercism/local/app.conf and restart Splunk.
- The script may take up to 10 minutes to start getting data into the Crittercism dashboards.
